casebody.data:
Al CANNON, Sheriff, applicant,
v.
Broderick William SEAY, Jr. No. 19A153. Supreme Court of the United States Aug. 9, 2019. IT IS ORDERED that the mandate of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit, case No. 18-7242, is hereby stayed pending receipt of a response, due on or before Friday, August 16, 2019, by 3 p.m. ET, and further order of the undersigned or of the Court.

UPON CONSIDERATION of the application of counsel for the applicant,
